changes.method_purpose: Persist all conversations to a directory as individual JSON files

patterns_discovered: Read-Write lock pattern for thread-safe data marshaling
Copying data under read lock before performing I/O outside of lock
Error wrapping for descriptive error messages
Defensive directory and file creation with appropriate permissions
gotchas_discovered: Potential performance overhead of copying all conversations before saving
No error handling for partial writes if saving multiple files fails midway
Lack of backup or atomic file write mechanism
recommendations: Consider adding a backup mechanism before overwriting existing files
Add optional compression for large conversation files
Create a corresponding Load/Restore method to complement Save
